long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
"The internet. Without Elon. One site at a time."

An extension to hide Elon-related content, on your favorite sites.

Supported Sites:
- reddit.com
- news.google.com
- twitter.com
- cnn.com

Roadmap:
- Additional Supported Sites
- Ability to filter other names (ie. Kim Kardashian, Donald Trump...)

Feature Requests:
Please feel free to submit requests for additional features, including additional supported sites!
